note.p: Daughter of Lewis James Leslie. Betrothed to Alfred Russel Wallace, 1864–5. Married Thomas Farmer Collins (1836–1914), rector of Church, Lancashire, in 1888.
Census returns of England and Wales 1861 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG9/18/2/8)
Correspondence vol. 13, letter from A. R. Wallace, 20 January 1865
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966, 1973–95 (Ancestry.com, accessed 8 July 2019)
England, select births and christenings, 1538–1975 (Ancestry.com, accessed 5 July 2019)
London, England, Church of England marriages and banns, 1754–1932 (Ancestry.com, accessed 8 July 2019)
Wallace’s notes for A. R. Wallace 1905 (Wallace family papers, private collection).
